Why might some antivirus software flag Verus as "not-a-virus" or "PUP"?

Some antivirus software, such as Avast and Kaspersky, may flag Verus as "not-a-virus" or "PUP" (Potentially Unwanted Program) because it is mining software. This is a warning that you are installing mining software, which may be installed by a third party to exploit your PC.
